languages.text: "Госпожа Хейдари, всему офицерскому составу, подключенному к вокс-системе, конечно же, в крайней степени неинтересно ваше мнение по данному вопросу".
"Mistress Heydari, I speak on behalf of every officer currently on the vox-line when I state my total lack of interest in hearing the end of that sentence."
languages.original_text: "Госпожа Хейдари, всему офицерскому составу, подключенному к вокс-системе, конечно же, в крайней степени неинтересно ваше мнение по данному вопросу".

traits.locale_text: "Mistress Heydari, I speak on behalf of every officer currently on the vox line when I state my total lack of interest in hearing the end of that sentence."
"Mistress Heydari, I speak on behalf of every officer currently on the vox line when I state my total lack of interest in hearing the end of that sentence."
"Mistress Heydari, I speak on behalf of every officer currently on the vox line when I state my total lack of interest in hearing the end of that sentence."
"Mistress Heydari, I speak on behalf of every officer currently on the vox-line when I state my total lack of interest in hearing the end of that sentence."

languages.text: « Maîtresse Heydari, je me fais la voix de tous les officiers présents sur la ligne-vox en affirmant que je n'ai absolument aucune envie d'entendre la fin de cette phrase. »
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari, I speak on behalf of every officer currently on the vox-line when I state my total lack of interest in hearing the end of that sentence."

traits.locale_text: « Maîtresse Heydari, je me fais la voix de tous les officiers présents sur la ligne-vox en affirmant que je n'ai absolument aucune envie d'entendre la fin de cette phrase. »

languages.text: “海达利女士，我代表目前音阵线路的所有官员在此声明，我们完全没兴趣知道后半句是什么。”
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari, I speak on behalf of every officer currently on the vox-line when I state my total lack of interest in hearing the end of that sentence."

traits.locale_text: “海达利女士，我代表目前音阵线路的所有官员在此声明，我们完全没兴趣知道后半句是什么。”

languages.text: 「ヘイダリ女史、私は、その文の終わりを聞くことに全く興味がないことを、現在、ヴォクス通信にいる全士官を代表して申し上げよう」
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari, I speak on behalf of every officer currently on the vox-line when I state my total lack of interest in hearing the end of that sentence."

traits.locale_text: 「ヘイダリ女史、私は、その文の終わりを聞くことに全く興味がないことを、現在、ヴォクス通信にいる全士官を代表して申し上げよう」

languages.text: "Herrin Heydari, ich spreche für alle Offiziere, die momentan in der Vox-Leitung sind, wenn ich meinem absolutem Desinteresse daran Ausdruck verleihe, das Ende dieses Satzes zu hören."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari, I speak on behalf of every officer currently on the vox-line when I state my total lack of interest in hearing the end of that sentence."

traits.locale_text: "Herrin Heydari, ich spreche für alle Offiziere, die momentan in der Vox-Leitung sind, wenn ich meinem absolutem Desinteresse daran Ausdruck verleihe, das Ende dieses Satzes zu hören."

languages.text: «Señora Heydari, hablo en nombre de todos los oficiales conectados a la línea de voco cuando afirmo que no me interesa en absoluto cómo termina esa frase».
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari, I speak on behalf of every officer currently on the vox-line when I state my total lack of interest in hearing the end of that sentence."

traits.locale_text: «Señora Heydari, hablo en nombre de todos los oficiales conectados a la línea de voco cuando afirmo que no me interesa en absoluto cómo termina esa frase».

languages.text: "Üstat Heydari, şu anda voks hattında bulunan tüm subaylar adına konuşuyor ve o cümlenin sonunu duymakla ilgilenmediğimi belirtmek istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari, I speak on behalf of every officer currently on the vox-line when I state my total lack of interest in hearing the end of that sentence."
